newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Aboitiz unit plans long-term debt paper.
newsitem.headline: Aboitiz unit plans long-term debt paper.

text.p: Davao Light & Power Co Inc, a subsidiary of Aboitiz Equity Ventures Inc, is planning to issue a 300 million peso long-term commercial paper, documents submitted to the Securities and Exchange Commission on Wednesday showed.
The company is earmarking 100 million pesos for the acquisition of fixed assets, 100 million pesos for payment of debts, and another 100 million pesos for its expansion programme.
The principal will be repaid at the end of the fifth year, while interest will be paid every quarter.

The power distribution firm has set the interest rate either at 10 percent per annum or one percentage point higher than the average of the two 91-day Treasury bill rates before the setting date. The company did not say whether it would pay the higher or lower of the two interest rates. - Manila newsroom 63 2 8418938 Fax 8176267
